summary: This is a deployment retry request with no code changes required. The diff shows modifications to backend/main.mo and project_state.json, which contradicts the constraint that no code changes should be made. The BuildRequest explicitly states this is a deployment-only operation using existing Version 8 artifacts.

hallucinated_features.description: Modifications to backend/main.mo code including type definitions and module implementations
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly constrains 'No code changes required' and specifies 'deployment retry only', yet backend code has been modified
BuildRequest specifies using existing Version 8 build artifacts with no modifications, but project_state.json has been changed
